entities.description: Refers to the use of prescription pain relievers to get over or avoid withdrawal symptoms during the past 12 months.
Refers to the use of heroin to get over or avoid withdrawal symptoms during the past 12 months.
Refers to the use of prescription tranquilizers, spending great deal of time using them, feeling their effects, or getting over their effects during the past 12 months.
Symptoms related to substance withdrawal which individuals may try to avoid.

relationships.description: Relates the use of prescription pain relievers to avoiding withdrawal symptoms.
Relates the use of heroin to avoiding withdrawal symptoms.
Relates the use of prescription tranquilizers to avoiding withdrawal symptoms.
